summary: DT:  CONSUMER STATES THAT THE STEEL BRAKE LINES  WERE RUSTED. CONSUMER NOTICED THE PROBLEM WHEN HE STEPPED ON THE BRAKES AND THEY  WENT TO THE FLOOR IN AUGUST 2004.  THEN , IN JUNE 2005 THIS HAPPENED AGAIN ON THE FRONT LINES.  IN AUGUST 2004 CONSUMER REPLACED THE BRAKE LINE HIMSELF IN THE REAR, WHICH WAS STILL GOOD. *AK
